system.description:
When you have your gang search their pockets and saddlebags for something, roll+hard.

It has to be something small enough to fit.

failure.label: Complications
failure.value: On a miss, one of you used to have just the thing, but it turns out that some asswipe stole it from you.

partial.label: Partial Success
partial.value: On a 7–9, one of you happens to have something pretty close, unless what you’re looking for is hi-tech, in which case no dice.

success.label: Success
success.value: On a 10+, one of you happens to have just the thing, or close enough.
